blog.name: noizyshark
blog.title: NoizyShark
blog.description:
Anime nerd? Check.
Cartoon fiend? Check.
Sci-fi afficianado? You Betcha. What you see is what you get: I'm just a 24 year old nerd who loves adventure! Call me: NoizyShark.

body:
Mina Ashido/Tohru Positivity Post

You know what bums me out? Characters in worlds with super-powers that have permanent inhuman features due to their powers. But Mina’s got pink skin, black eyes with yellow irises, anntanae/horns and she KNOWS she’s still cute AF and flaunts it!

It’s so cool to see a character that’s just so proud to be unique and happy with themselves, without ever seeing their odd power-caused features as something to be ashamed of! Similarly, Tohru is literally permanently invisible, and yet she frequently gestures and her personality is so lively that she can’t be ignored! They’re lovely and they subvert this trope and it brings me joy seeing how happy they are to be unique!

title: Sheltered Beasts
description:
by polipea

Animal hybrids are popular pets. Mythical breeds, like dragons, are rare but seen as the best money can buy. Not everyone is suited to own such dangerous beasts, so a Dragon Sanctuary was built just in time before a pet dragon went rogue. Inside the sanctuary, Bakugou was going crazy. Until another dragon was introduced to be his ‘companion’…

Words: 1995, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou, Midoriya Izuku, Iida Tenya
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou

blog.name: baksdeks
blog.description: Franki | He/She/They | BYF

summary:
Borrowing @fairyfaraway ‘s idea with the whole ‘How To Write Bakugou Well’, I have a few things to add!
• It’s totally ok to be...
body:
Borrowing @fairyfaraway ‘s idea with the whole ‘How To Write Bakugou Well’, I have a few things to add!

• It’s totally ok to be lenient with his character- after all, it is fan fiction. A lot of people enjoy it. You can experiment a bit; make him a lil’ meaner, give different motives, or even make him a bit nicer!

- The extremes, in this scenerio, would be to make him an abusive asshole. Don’t do that. Stop it. What you should do instead, is replace him with one of the complex, Actual Villains. Why are you guys so adverse to using Toga? Or Dabi? Try it out.

• He has his ups and downs. I’d recommend exploring both his shortcomings and his good parts. He’s dedicated, loyal, and honest, but sometimes he goes about it the wrong way. He’s a little rough around the edges, and not very great with people, but once he’s attached to someone, they probs aren’t going anywhere.

- Don’t only focus on his negative points, or his good parts. I know it’s hard to find a balance, but in order to get better at writing, you need to try your luck on this one. Bakugou isn’t a pure ‘UwU’ child, but he isn’t a one-note Disney villain, either.

• Before writing him, study how Horikoshi makes him speak, if you notice any patterns, include them! Only if you wanna be canon compliant, of course. It’ll be fun to lay some Easter eggs!

- Don’t rely too much on Horikoshi’s writing. If you do, your story may become boring, or predictable. Deviate some bit, throw in a wrench, have some fun!

• Bakugou is smart. You know it, I know it, everyone knows it. Don’t do what I think your doing. You know what I’m talking about!

- Don’t. Make. Him. Stupid.

• It’s totally cool to shove your headcanons into your fic! I swear, if you wanna make him trans? So. Many. People. Will. Read. It. Your headcanons may not be as unpopular as you think! I love reading fics where they have headcanons included! I think it’s sweet, and shows that you really care about his character.

blog.name: greenvalleybroccoli
blog.title: Deku Said Trans Rights!!!
blog.description: Hi, I'm Bennett. I'm 24 but I have trouble with social stuff so I might come across as immature. I'm studying Japanese and I love BNHA a little too much. I also love my sister @r2-dj! Feel free to ask me anything as long as it's SFW!

summary: Finally I’m having a day when I’m not too exhausted to read the BNHA manga!! How long has Aizawa-sensei been working at U.A. if...
caption:
Finally I’m having a day when I’m not too exhausted to read the BNHA manga!! How long has Aizawa-sensei been working at U.A. if he’s expelled 154 students already….also does this guidebook have data on how many times the other teachers have expelled people?? And why is that the ONLY thing listed besides his name and homeroom?

[Text reads: “What a huge hardship!!”

Aizawa Shouta

CODE NAME Erasure Hero: Eraser Head

Total number of expelled students 154

This year he is homeroom teacher for 1-A]

[Translation note: The character 消 in Aizawa’s first name means “erase” or “extinguish”. Most of the characters’ names have some relation to their quirks, if you’re curious about anyone’s name in particular feel free to send me an ask!]

blog.name: blackdagger456
blog.title: Hey There
blog.description: Whats up as the host of Lets Talk and average Fic writer I welcome you to my dumpster fire of a tumblr.

summary: Bakugou Katsuki is a lot of things as of the current manga he’s a lot calmer than he was in the beginning he’s acknowledged...
body:
Let’s Talk: About Why I can Respect/Acknowledge But Never Truly Like Katsuki Bakugo

Bakugou Katsuki is a lot of things as of the current manga he’s a lot calmer than he was in the beginning he’s acknowledged Izuku and is on the way to being not only a proper hero but also a proper rival for our resident cinnamon roll…however that does not make up for the shit he put said cinnamon roll through.

In this first scene I don’t think I’ve ever, for personal, gotten so fucking angry at a fictional character before and I’d find that I wouldn’t feel this level of anger again till I met Overhaul but that’s a whole nother’ post. The fact that it’s later revealed that he’s been this for the better part of ten years only furthered my disliked for our resident Pomeranian the dude was supposed to be Izukus childhood friend and he just tells him to go fucking kill himself!? Imagine for a second that Izuku had taken the plunge after all this is the same day All Might crushed his dreams(On a side note I want to point how how much of a hypocrite he was to do so with him being quirkless at first like Izuku.) what if All Might hadn’t been able to find Izuku to give him OFA do you guys really think him killing himself would be so far out of reality?? Not to mention the massive hit Izuku self esteem got over the years with the reflex of cowering before Katsuki being ingrained into his mind, I mean seriously how much bullying do you have to go through for your body to involuntarily act like that around someone you consider a friend!? On a side note Izuku is very lucky he didn’t come out with any physical as well as mental scars considering the constant explosions used on his body.

And then during the sports festival he says the same thing the instant he sees Izuku in the hall way. Now maybe he’s nervous about the upcoming fights and is taking it out on Deku but that does not excuse the words being said.

And then this scene…just…god. All Izuku’s trying to do is get Katsuki to work with him so they can pass the exam because their up against All Might who at the rim still has the power to act as the number one fucking hero in Japan and when he implies that Katsuki cant beat him on his own the blonde cracks him across face. This single action could’ve severely injured Izuku as Katsuki has on fucking grenades on his hands and if he had swung an inch closer to the right he probably would’ve broken Izuku’s nose. And I get that Aizawa and All Might put them together so Izuku and Katsuki could properly work together to achieve a goal but that’s not the problem here, Izuku can work together with anyone to try and accomplish something that’s just who he is no matter the personal grudge between him and someone he’ll always try to work through it with you to get the job done. Pre-Kamino Katsuki however views everyone as extras or stepping stone on his path to being #1 and that goes double for Izuku as until recently he was just a quirkless nobody to take out his frustration on and this mindset should not be Izuku’s responsibility to correct. It is not his job to fix Katsuki, it’s not his job to keep him in check it’s the teachers job to correct this not a 15 year old insecure hero in training job.

*Sigh* However I do acknowledge that after Kamino Katsuki has started to change. One example being how he helped Denki against his fight with Seiji Shishikura and his actions in save Kyoka, which earned him some brownie points from me personally, in the joint training with 1-B. There was also that time in which he made Kaminari fry his brain to lift the atmosphere after Kamino and payed Ejirou back the money he used to help save him. I recognize that he’s not a complete asshole as during his fight with Ochako he was putting all he had into it out of respect and not maliciousness and the fact that he’s now tryin’ to help Deku control OFA also proves that he’s trying to make things better between them. Like Denki said during the Provisional Exam he’s deadly serious about being a hero and while I can never ignore or forget his actions I can acknowledge his strength and growth.

If you have anything to say to me about these things that I’ve stated the ask box is open for use.
